content: तः {@--1@} A tail. {@--2@} The tail of a jackal. {@--3@} The breast. {@--4@} The womb. {@--5@} The hip or flank. {@--6@} A warrior. {@--7@} A thief. {@--8@} A wicked man. {@--9@} An outcast, a barbarian. {@--10@} A Bud dha. {@--11@} A jewel. {@--12@} Nectar. {@--13@} (In prosody) One of the eight syllabic feet. --ता, --तं {@--1@} Passing, crossing. {@--2@} Virtue, religious merit. --ता <ab>N.</ab> of Lakṣmī.
